title: Random DC's from games and wont let me reconnect
body: "We're aware of a problem causing players to disconnect from their games, and are investigating the problem." does that mean the 4 times I got leave buster for disconnected for 10mins will be taken off my account? always fun losing 75 LP because of random Riot client issue

replies.body:
Hi folks

Thanks for the info and reports of the issues you're seeing.

We've heard reports from some players that they are seeing disconnects being caused by Avast, and that disabling that software results in LoL working again.   Do any of you use Avast by any chance?

Cheers
Mindstar
I don't use avast, using AVG. but similar to another comment, restarting my entire computer allows the client to load, for around 10 minutes before it force quits again.

If i try to reconnect to the game, it just boots me right back out, over and over and over, i think i tried to reconnect to 3 separate games, each over 20 times each, before i just axed the client. So yeah....

Had something similar to this as well, could never get past the loading screen to get into game no matter how many times I try to reconnect or no matter how long I try to wait it out on 90 something %. Eventually, the client just froze and I was just forced to give up altogether. No Avast either. Such a bummer because ranked games too
I also don't use avast and I still can't load into any games, even after disabling my PC's antivirus and firewall. It's been 24hrs so far that my game hasn't worked at all.

Really sorry to hear you are still having issues :'(

Have you had any luck since the time you posted?

There are a few other things it could be, so I'd definitely recommend getting a request in to Player Support, as they will be able to help go through your game logs and figure out what might be wrong.

Cheers
Mindstar

No progress here, still copping it.

I filed a support ticket a few days ago but i assume they have been getting a lot of requests so i'm guessing it will take a bit for them to respond.

Cheers

The support team should be able to help you further, but just to update, we've actually seen the same issues being reported by players who use AVG, not just Avast.  

In the case that it isn't Antivirus related (it is always possible that you are experiencing something different), it would be worth checking if there is anything else that could be a common theme.   For those still experiencing the "can't load in" issue - what ISP are you on?  Is it happening every single game still?

we are about to find out and it wont be AVG because I have had it set to exceptions of AVG since the bug splat bug years ago and this has randomly come about im actually just going to t1 down mid until im banned if it continues I can connect to custom games and sit there fine.... go in ranked and instantly kicked waste of time 100 LP down the drain

Perhaps avoiding ranked would be wise until the issue is resolved. 

Depending on how AVG treats exceptions (I'm no expert), it could still be AVG related, or as Mindstar says it could be a different connection issue than the one affecting others at the moment that you are experiencing.

If you know you're having issues connecting to games, then avoiding ranked seems wise.
